html:
The unexpected tour reveal unites two boundary-pushing artists at the height of their creative powers.

Justice: Matt Weinberger | Kaytranada: Hannah Sider

The unexpected tour reveal unites two boundary-pushing artists at the height of their creative powers.

  • Home
  • EVENTS

Justice and Kaytranada have announced a co-headlining North American arena tour.

The surprise reveal landed with little warning and no official details, just matching story posts that sent fans into a frenzy. What followed was an official announcement revealing a month-long run across the United States and Canada this fall.

Justice is fresh off the release of Hyperdrama, their first album in nearly eight years. The project finds the French duo diving even deeper into their dense, analog-rooted sound, this time with a sharper cinematic edge. Kaytranada, on the other hand, continues his streak of understated dominance with TIMELESS, a record steeped in rhythm and rich with collaborators ranging from Childish Gambino to Rochelle Jordan.

Justice and Kaytranada are a dominant pairing, and seeing them share a bill promises an experience that could be as memorable as it is groundbreaking. Both are known for crafting live sets that leave a lasting mark, with production choices that reflect clear creative identities. Justice leans into distortion and grandiosity, while Kaytranada thrives on bounce and feel. Even with contrasting styles, the chemistry feels inevitable.

Scroll to Continue

Recommended Articles

Pre-sale tickets go on sale Tuesday, July 22nd, 2025, at 10 AM local time. You can learn more about the collaborative tour and purchase tickets here.
